title: Inside The New York Times Book Review: Richard McGuire’s ‘Here’
description: This week, Richard McGuire talks about “Here”; John Williams has news from the literary world and feedback from readers; Simon Parkin discusses two new books about gaming; and Gregory Cowles has best-seller news. Parul Sehgal, filling in for Pamela Paul, is the host.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
